name: Freewall
tagline: Creating dynamic grid layout without gaps.
body:
Free Wall

Creating dynamic grid layouts without gaps.

How it works

Based on the width (or height) of a container and the width (height) of a cell unit, It will create a virtual matrix. Scaning the matrix at each cell will find a free cell around to made a free area, then try to fit a block element into it. In case no block can fit the gap, it will resize the block to fill the gap (that is one of the options).

Some example layouts:

  • Flex layout
  • Grid layout
  • Images layout
  • Pinterest layout

Getting started

Freewall requires jQuery framework. It requires browsers whichs support CSS3 for some nice animation effects.

							
							    <!DOCTYPE html>
							    <html>
							    <head>
							      <title> freewall demo getting started</title>
							      <script src="js/jquery-1.7.min.js"></script>
							      <script src="js/freewall.js"></script>
							      <style type="text/css">
							        #container {
							          width: 80%;
							          margin: auto;
							        }
							        .item {
							          background: rgb(135, 199, 135);
							          width: 320px;
							          height: 320px;
							        }
							      </style>
							    </head>
							    <body>
							      <ul id="container">
							        <li class="item"></li>
							        <li class="item"></li>
							        <li class="item"></li>
							        <li class="item"></li>
							        <li class="item"></li>
							        <li class="item"></li>
							        <li class="item"></li>
							      </ul>
							      <script>
							        $(function() {
							          var wall = new freewall("#container");
							          wall.fitWidth();
							        });
							      </script>
							    </body>
							    </html>

Options

  • animate
  • block
  • cell
  • fillGap
  • gutter
  • selector

Options

All options are parameters of Reset method

  • animate : boolean

    True to make block move with animation

  • block.flex : boolean

    True to made block can resize a bit to fit
    False of block has class 'fixed' to keep size of block can't change

  • cell.width : number

    The width of unit, base on it will build grid container.

  • cell.height : number

    The height of unit, base on it will build grid container.

  • fillGap : boolean

    True will made layout without gap.

  • gutter : mixed

    The spacing between the blocks. Default is number, but can set it with 'auto' value.

  • selector : string

    Get all blocks to made layout

  • Example 

    								
								    var wall = new freewall('.free-wall');
								    wall.reset({
								      selector: '.brick',
								      animate: true,
								      block: {
								        flex: true
								      },
								      cell: {
								        width: 150,
								        height: 150
								      },
								      fillGap: false
								    });

Events

  • onResize
  • onSetBlock

Events

  • onResize

    Registry callback when browser resize.

  • Example 

    								
								    var wall = new freewall('.free-wall');
								    wall.reset({
								      selector: '.brick',
								      onResize: function() {
								        this.fitWidth();
								      }
								    });

  • onSetBlock

    Registry callback when arrange block.

Methods

  • fitHeight
  • fitWidth
  • fitZone
  • fixSize
  • reset
  • setFilter
  • unsetFilter

Methods

  • fitHeight(height)

    Made the layout fit with limit height

  • fitWidth(width)

    Made the layout fit with limit width

  • fitZone(width, height)

    Made the layout fit with limit width and height

  • fixSize(object)

    Set a block with special width or height
    Example 
    								
								    var wall = new freewall('.free-wall');
								    var dna = $(".free-wall .flex-layout");
								    wall.unsetFilter();
								    wall.fixSize({
								        block: dna,
								        width: 150,
								        height: 150
									});
								    wall.fitWidth();

  • reset(options)

    Config options for render layout.
    Example 
    								
								    var ewall = new freewall(demo);
								    var demo = $(".example");
								    ewall.reset({
								      selector: '.cell',
								      animate: false,
								      block: {
								        flex: 1
								      },
								      cell: {
								        width: 150,
								        height: 150
								      },
								      fillGap: true
								    });
								    ewall.fitWidth(cwidth);

  • setFilter(selector)

    Fillter blocks to show

  • unsetFilter()

    Made all block to show

Example

Flex layout

Flex layout 

							
							    var ewall = new freewall(demo);
							    ewall.reset({
							      selector: '.cell',
							      animate: false,
							      block: {
							        flex: 1
							      },
							      cell: {
							        width: 150,
							        height: 150
							      },
							      fillGap: true
							    });
							    ewall.fitWidth(cwidth);

Example

Grid layout

Grid layout 

							
							    var ewall = new freewall(demo);
							    ewall.reset({
							      selector: '.cell',
							      animate: false,
							      block: {
							        flex: 1
							      },
							      cell: {
							        width: 180,
							        height: 180
							      },
							      fillGap: false
							    });
							    ewall.fitWidth(cwidth);

Example

Image layout

Image layout 

							
							    var ewall = new freewall(demo);
							    ewall.reset({
							      selector: '.cell',
							      animate: false,
							      block: {
							        flex: true
							      },
							      cell: {
							        width: 30,
							        height: 150
							      },
							      fillGap: 1
							    });
							    ewall.fitWidth(cwidth);

Example

Like Pinterest

Like Pinterest layout 

							
							    var ewall = new freewall(demo);
							    ewall.reset({
							      selector: '.cell',
							      animate: false,
							      block: {
							        flex: 1
							      },
							      cell: {
							        width: 120,
							        height: 10
							      },
							      gutter: 'auto',
							      fillGap: false
							    });
							    ewall.fitWidth(cwidth);

Demo

Fit height

Fit height 

							
							    new freewall('.free-wall')
							    .fitHeight(320);

Demo

Filter

Filter 

							
							    new freewall('.free-wall')
							    .setFilter('.size22, .size11')
							    .fitWidth();
